package.name: Translation2
package.description: This class provides an easy way to retrieve all the strings for a multilingual site from a data source (i.e. db). A PEAR::DB and a PEAR::MDB container are provided, more containers will follow. It is designed to reduce the number of queries to the db, caching the results when possible. An Admin class is provided to easily manage translations (add/remove a language, add/remove a string).

release.notes: - added an experimental GNU gettext driver - translate() now accepts a third parameter ($pageID) - PHP5 fix - renamed old getPage() to getRawPage() - new getPage() resorts to fallback lang and replaces parameters when needed
